NW_Mask_Presence.help: Mask Presence makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Mask Presence cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

Mental_Training.help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

NW_Mind_Link.help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Long
NW_Mind_Link.targetHelp: Your chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance improve due to the Mind Link.
NW_Mind_Link.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance.
NW_Mind_Link.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance with their {PowerName}.

Placate.help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also grant you stealth. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

messages.victimHit: You have been Placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. This power does not stack with multiple castings.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.targetHelp: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.victimHit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Elude.help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Elude also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Elude.attackerHit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit.

messages.attackerHit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!
